name: Let's Try [a togachako fangame]
description:
A short demo of a fangame of the Toga x Ochako ship <3

  • There are 3 "endings" available at the moment [though their routes are not finished yet]:
    • 2 safe routes: Prepare to assist Ochako on her way to getting the girl!
    • 1 darker route: Attempt to "romance" Ochako and ignore the warning signs!
      • Future warnings include: [hinted abuse], [general violence], [stalking], tbd.

Please keep in mind this demo was created in a span of 5 days, and is by no means complete or polished!

Be kind; constructive criticism and suggestions are welcome.

Consider to donating at: https://ko-fi.com/sin_kinies

I hope you all enjoy!
